name: Crook's Slice
description: A basic attack that anyone who picks up a dagger could execute. Not to be used by anyone with decent experience with shortblades.

name: Straight Slice
description: A straightforward attack at center mass. Your basic low poise damage move.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Quick Slice
description: A fast and balanced attack. A basic move to generate poise and deal some damage.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Deep Slice
description: A hard, deep cut. A strong critical striking move to use at high poise.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 4x damage
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 10 - Deal 2x damage

name: Lacerating Slice
description: A slash with a serrated blade. A basic damage over time attack.

name: Precision Slice
description: An accurate attack. An alternative to Straight Slice with some added accuracy.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Vanish
description: You find cover and hide. A great way to utilize special positions that provide cover.
effects: * You Maneuver into a Special Position that provides cover, ignoring adjacency and special entry restrictions

name: Ready For The Kill
description: You prepare for a lethal attack. A powerful poise generating move if you manage to find cover.

name: Lethal Slice
description: An attack at the jugular veins. With some luck, this move could kill someone in one shot.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill

name: Assassinate
description: A killing blow. A powerful move to use at high poise, with a wide critical strike range.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 4x damage
* On Attack Roll of 10 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 9 - Deal 2x damage

name: Advancing Slice
description: A sudden ambush. A flexible mobility move with some damage.

name: Retreating Slice
description: A quick step back. A flexible mobility move with some damage.

name: Twin Slice
description: An attack with two knives. An alternative to Straight Slice with better critical strike chance, available to dual wielding dagger users.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 4x damage
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage

name: Stalk
description: You carefully advance. A mobility move that also generates poise.

name: Bloodlust
description: Seeing blood fall makes you excited. A risky poise generating move that has high payoff with the right setup and with good luck.
effects: * Choose a target enemy. At the end of this round, you gain poise equal to 5 times the amount of damage they take from Bleed

name: Relentless
description: You never let up. A move that can help you string more than one critical strike together.
effects: * If your last attack was a critical strike, your next move has its minimum critical strike requirement expanded by 1

name: Evasive Footwork
description: You are hard to pin down. A defensive buff that sets up for a safe maneuver next round.
effects: * Your Maneuvers cannot be prevented by moves or spell effects until the end of the next round

name: Focus
description: You prepare for a powerful attack. A more accessible version of Relentless.
effects: * Your next move has its minimum critical strike requirement expanded by 1 value

name: Backup Slice
description: You back up a teammate. Automatic counterattacks to help defend for an ally in the frontline.
effects: * Until the beginning of your next turn, whenever target ally in the frontline is hit by an attack, you attack the enemy that attacked the target, dealing 2d4 damage with the following:
* On Attack Roll of 11 or 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Backstab
description: An attack from behind. A great way to punish enemies aiming at your allies in the back.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage
* If your target attacked an ally in a line behind you this round, this attack has +1 to hit and +2d4 damage

name: Hidden Slice
description: An attack from stealth. A more powerful version of Straight Slice if you are hidden.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 4x damage

name: Shadow Slice
description: A fast attack from stealth. An alternative to Quick Slice if you are hidden.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 4x damage

name: Sneak Attack
description: A powerful attack from stealth. A more powerful version of Deep Slice if you are hidden.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 4x damage
* On Attack Roll of 10 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 9 - Deal 2x damage

name: Ichor Slice
description: An attack that bleeds the enemy's momentum. A basic poise damage move that combos with bleed attacks.
effects: * Target loses 5 poise; if they took damage from Bleed since their last turn, they lose 10 poise instead

name: Skyfall Slice
description: A falling assassination. A strong way to engage an enemy below you.
additional_requirements: * You have a height advantage over your target
effects: * On Attack Roll of 11 or 12 - Deal 3x damage
* You may Maneuver to any low ground position; if you do, you gain +1 Accuracy Token

name: Throwing Knife
description: An attack with a thrown dagger. A basic ranged option for dealing with distant targets.
effects: * This attack ignores positional advantage and disadvantage
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 3x damage

name: Ambush Slice
description: An attack on an unprepared enemy. A great opening move for each new combat.
effects: * If the target has not acted yet this combat, this attack has +1 to hit, +2d4 damage, and has the following:
* On Attack Roll of 9, 10, 11, or 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Sharpen
description: You sharpen your blade. A low cost damage buff.
effects: * Your next attack has +1D damage on a regular hit or +2D damage on a critical strike

name: Stiletto
description: You sharpen your blade to a fine point. A higher cost, more powerful damage buff.
effects: * Your next attack has +2D damage on a regular hit or +3D damage on a critical strike

name: Sanguine Blade
description: A legendary attack that makes rivers run red. A more powerful version of Lacerating Slice to use at high poise.

name: Alleyway Slice
description: An attack from the bowels of a dark city. A strong attack with good instant kill criticals if you are in a city.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 11 or 12 - Instant Kill
* If this attack kills the target, you become hidden in your current position until the end of the current round

name: Spinning Slice
description: You spin your daggers quickly. A poise generating move for dual wielding shortblade users.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage

name: Rapid Slice
description: A series of attacks. A more efficient alternative to Twin Slice that forces you to commit to its use a second time.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 11 or 12 - Deal 2x damage
* You automatically repeat this attack during your next turn on the same target instead of taking an action

name: Fleet Footwork
description: You move too fast to hit. A strong, short lived defensive buff at a low poise cost.
effects: * You have +2 AC until the end of this round

name: Walk in Shadows
description: You are one with the darkness. A strong option to enable your hidden attacks.
effects: * Until your poise falls below 50, your critical strikes have:
* Become hidden in your current position until the end of the next round

name: Nightwalker Slice
description: An attack from the cover of night. A powerful damage dealing move if it's nighttime.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 11 or 12 - Deal 3x damage
* This attack gains +2d4 damage and its minimum critical strike requirement is expanded by 2 if it is nighttime

name: Parting Gift
description: An attack as you and your team head out. A good way to deal some damage and deplete some enemy poise if your allies provide some assistance, or to punish enemy forced movement moves.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage
* This attack has +2d4 damage and causes the target to lose 5 poise if you maneuvered due to another character's move this round.

name: Macebreaker
description: An attack demonstrating the daggers precise superiority over the mace. A good option to counter enemy blunt weapon users.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 2x damage
* This attack has +1 to hit and +2d4 damage if the target is wielding a blunt weapon

name: Throatslitting Slice
description: An attack to cut breath short. A strong counter to enemy spellcasters.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* This attack has +2d4 damage if the target cast a spell this round
* The target fails to cast spells until the end of the next round

name: Fan of Knives
description: An attack with many thrown daggers. A decent way to deal chip damage to many enemies.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 4x damage

name: Quickdraw Slice
description: An attack with a freshly drawn dagger. A strong opening move if you've just weapon swapped to a shortblade, for those who use more than one weapon.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 2x damage
* This attack has +2 to hit and +2d4 damage if your last action was a weapon swap

name: Knife Juggling
description: You juggle many knives but choose one. A random attack that has the chance of saving you some poise if you're lucky.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Gain 15 poise
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Gain 10 poise
* On Attack Roll of 10 - Gain 5 poise

name: Scoundrel's Slice
description: An attack while you use another person as a meat shield. A way to redirect damage to another ally.
effects: * The next attack this round that targets you is redirected to a target ally in the same line

name: Sawtooth Edge
description: You modify your blade to draw more blood. A setup move for a bleed attack.
effects: * Your next move that applies a Bleed effect applies twice as much Bleed instead

name: Lucky Slice
description: An attack that gambles a little. This attack is only good if you manage to score a critical strike.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 4x damage

name: Hunter's Slice
description: An attack that doesn't give the enemy time to rest. A strong punishment to poise gain moves.
effects: * This attack has +1d4 damage for every 5 poise the target gained this round

name: Blood Rain
description: You throw many fine needles. A way to inflict bleed to all enemies.

name: Empowered Slice
description: An attack with variable critical strike chance. If you're willing to spend extra poise, you can fish for a critical strike.
effects: * When you execute this move, spend an additional 10 poise any number of times, and expand this attack's minimum critical strike requirement by 1 for each time you do so
* On Attack Roll of 12 - Deal 4x damage

name: Heartseeker
description: An attack that gains momentum with kills. A great way to finish off an enemy and setup for another powerful turn.
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll fo 11 - Deal 4x damage
* If this attack kills the target, your poise becomes 90

name: Twilight
description: A masterful stroke that fells the mighty. A powerful attack to use at maximum poise once per day.
additional_requirements: * You have rested at least once since you last executed this move
effects: * On Attack Roll of 12 - Instant Kill
* On Attack Roll of 11 - Deal 4x damage
* On Attack Roll of 10 - Deal 3x damage
* On Attack Roll of 9 - Deal 2x damage
* Your next attack has its minimum critical strike requirement expanded by 2; if that attack is a critical strike, it refunds its poise cost and this effect occurs again
